column4: Some one helpe to install my video?i try with many metods and all will be wrong!My video is : GeForce Fx 5600xt 128Mb.i try to install by linux recomendation,i install by downlad drive in nvidia.com and install after...but all instalations when i rebot the X the screens comes black and i cant see nothing.
xorg sucks for debugging, check /var/log/Xorg.0.log and look for entires that are prefaced with [EE] and start googling, good luck
